column1: Little Goat Diner////Great spot for brunch
column2: Little Goat has a fantastic menu of traditional and interesting breakfast and lunch entrees.  Bright and lively atmosphere
column3: and friendly service.  Shrimp and grits were tasty
column7: and crisp asparagus.  Looking forward to trying the huge sandwiches on my next visit.  Cool bar
column8: bakery and coffee bar make this a great destination.
